segments.text: I see a cozy kitchen scene with a woman and two children.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is drying dishes, looking very focused.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the sink is overflowing, water spilling onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She doesn't seem to notice the water at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the children are being quite clever, taking cookies while she's distracted.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is standing on a stool, reaching into the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if he will share the cookies with his sister.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is looking up at him, waiting for her treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the garden outside the window, looking calm and tidy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit amused watching this scene.
segments.speaker: PAR
